name: Invoice Creation Guide
description: Learn how to create a customer invoice step by step

popover.title: Welcome to Invoice Creation
popover.description: This guide will show you how to create a customer invoice. Let's get started!

popover.title: Select a Customer
popover.description: First, select the customer you want to invoice. You can search for customers by name or choose from the dropdown menu.

popover.title: Select a Product/Service
popover.description: Choose the product or service you want to add to the invoice. Each item has a preset price.

popover.title: Enter Quantity
popover.description: Specify how many units of this product or service the customer is purchasing.

popover.title: Add Line Items
popover.description: Click here to add products or services to the invoice. You can add multiple line items.

popover.title: Review Line Items
popover.description: Here you can see all the line items added to the invoice. You can edit quantities or remove items as needed.

popover.title: Preview Invoice
popover.description: Review the invoice details including customer information, line items, and total amounts before saving.

popover.title: Save Invoice
popover.description: When you're satisfied with the invoice, click here to save it. The invoice will be added to your invoice list.
